meta.good: images relating to Islamic religion or Islamic culture, such as prayer or religious congregation; passages of scripture or inspirational quotes related to Islam; information about the Islamic religion
meta.ok: images showing architecture or landmarks from places related to the religion; images of people who happen to be muslim
meta.poor: images that don't appear related to Islam without any accompanying text; images that disparage or would offend a person interested in Islam

meta.good: images of no-bake cookies (cookies that are not meant to be baked before eating)
meta.poor: images showing cookies that need to be oven-baked

meta.good: images of the actress Jennifer Lawrence
meta.ok: illustrations of Jennifer Lawrence or characters that she plays;
meta.poor: images of other actors, even if from the same films

meta.ok: illustrations of feathers; tattoos of birds

meta.good: images of interior window decorations; images of blinds, curtains, drapes or shades on windows
meta.ok: exterior images of windows; images of special window glass, such as stained or frosted glass
meta.poor: illustrations of windows; photos only showing fabric

meta.good: ideas for christmas decorations or crafts, christmas-oriented gifts, or christmas cooking
meta.ok: recipes or images of big meals or snacks that might be appropriate for Christmas but are not Christmas-themed
meta.poor: general gift ideas that are not clearly related to Christmas
